DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research develop predictive nomogram primary ovarian insufficiency .
DOC.brief_title: Development Predictive Nomogram Primary Ovarian Insufficiency
DOC.detailed_description: Many research show primary ovarian insufficiency ( POI ) etiology relate gene , immunization , iatrogenic , infection factor social factor etc . In fact , approximate 70-90 % POI definite cause , lot patient n't know happen occult stage POI . In research , researcher investigate possible factor POI patient normal woman select valuable risk factor integrate statistical method establish reasonable predictive model . This study consist two stages.The fist stage model establishment , second stage certificate evaluate model .
DOC.criteria: Age1842 Definite spontaneous last menstrual period Informed consent participate research could answer questionnaire faithfully . Congenital gonadal dysgenesis non organic disease lead menstrual disorder . Endocrine diseases Polycystic ovary syndrome , hyperprolactinemia , dysfunctional uterine bleeding , low gonadotropin menstrual disorder hyperthyreosis Reproductive toxicity drug use Release chemotherapeutic drug Accept sex hormone medicine recent 3 month Pregnant lactate woman With serious heart , liver , kidney disease With severe psychiatric disorder
